topic.name: lists
topic.description: HTML lists allow web developers to group a set of related items in lists.

concept.name: ul
concept.description: An unordered list starts with the <ul> tag. Each list item starts with the <li> tag.

concept.name: ol
concept.description: An ordered list starts with the <ol> tag. Each list item starts with the <li> tag.

concept.name: dl
concept.description:
HTML also supports description lists.
A description list is a list of terms, with a description of each term.
The <dl> tag defines the description list, the <dt> tag defines the term (name), and the <dd> tag describes each term:
concept.code: <dl> <dt>Coffee</dt> <dd>- black hot drink</dd> <dt>Milk</dt> <dd>- white cold drink</dd> </dl>
